remarks: Part of proof of Lemma C in [Crawley] p. 113.  (Contributed by NM, 26-May-2012.)
statement:
cdlemc3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemc3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemc3.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemc3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemc3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemc3.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemc3.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemc4 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ -. Q .<_ ( P .\/ ( F ` P ) ) ) -> ( Q .\/ ( R ` F ) ) =/= ( ( F ` P ) .\/ ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
